title: About RIOT Impact Challenge

embed.description: Join in the Riot Impact Challenge and help us support four hard-carry causes in the coming year while unlocking unique rewards. After scouting potential allies working in social impact, we found four non-profits who care deeply about the same issues players and Riot agree are important.

body:
Who's in for these rewards?

Atm when you donate your meant to receive an Email...I haven't. Still waiting though it says shortly. 

Anyway which reward would you like most?
